articles.content: The new DJI Mini 2 drone is arriving just 53 weeks after the original DJI Mavic Mini, but bringing with it a new 4K camera, DJIs much-loved OcuSync 2.0 long-range radio control system, beefed-up moto… [+6492 chars]
